decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-family: Arial;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work begins. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 11pt;">1:20 elevations and cross sections&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 11pt;">1:5 glazing bar and proposed glazing;</span></p><p><span is="qowt-word-run" qowt-eid="E423" id="E423" class="qowt-font2-Arial" style="font-size: 11pt;">1:5 section showing the position of the window in relation to the masonry</span><span is="qowt-word-run" qowt-eid="E424" id="E424" class="qowt-font2-Arial" style="font-size: 11pt;">.</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span></p><p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.\n\nREASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:65280},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Removal of rear window and installation of new first floor rear window and replacement of existing doors with new doors to rear elevation
